summary: A British college professor, working in Russia, investigates certain mysteries surrounding the life and death of Joseph Stalin.
cast: Daniel Craig|Yekaterina Rednikova|Gabriel Macht|Lev Prygunov|Alexey Diakov|Harry Ditson|Tanya Moodie|Avtandil Makharadze|Anna Gerasimova|Claudia Harrison|Kaspars Zvigulis|Valery Chernyak|Aurelija Anuzhite|Ziedonis Lochmelis|Jakov Rafalson|Ervand Arzumanyan|Elena Butenko|Kseniya Entelis|Dmitry Palejes|Rostislav Lavrentev|Guntis Pilsums|Rezija Kalnina|Imbi Strenga|Konstantin Lavronenko|Lyudmila Golubeva|Igor Filippov|Juris Strenga|Igor Chernyavskiy|Romualds Ancans|Aleksey Khardikov|Tatjena Lukashenkova|Dainis Porgants|Leonids Lencs|Aris Rozentals|Kristina Brize|Normunds Berzs|Normunds Laizans|Ivo Martinsons
title: Arcángel
